titleStmt.title: A dissenter from those (by some) called Foxonian Quakers, having lately put forth a paper for the exaltation of the Lord's Christ, &c. which a certain person having read over again and again, and hoping it may be profitable to many, hath caused it to be reprinted as following, that so it may be more universally spread abroad for its further service.
titleStmt.author: M. S.

titleStmt.title: A dissenter from those (by some) called Foxonian Quakers, having lately put forth a paper for the exaltation of the Lord's Christ, &c. which a certain person having read over again and again, and hoping it may be profitable to many, hath caused it to be reprinted as following, that so it may be more universally spread abroad for its further service.
titleStmt.author: M. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: ... are to be sold (with the other impression) at George Keith's ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
